channel.title: Need Help Running!
channel.description:
Well basicly, I've begun hosting a server and my friend wanted to play, he downloaded the client and the windows 7 convert thing and tried to connect, he came up with this error below, the client base is also below. If anyone could help it would be great!
Client base: Exion His system: Windows 7 (64-bit)
[code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Jframe Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Jframe at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run<Unknown Source> at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged<Native Method> at java.net.URLClassLoader.findclass<Unknown Source> at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass<Unknown Source> at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass<Unknown Source> at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass <Unknown Source> Could not find the main class: Jframe. Program will exit.
[/code]
Normal Run (VISTA - XP) [code] @echo off title Exion Client java -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 pause [/code]
Windows 7 [code]@echo off title Client cd ./Class/ "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx200m Jframe 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause [/code]

item.title: Need Help Running!
item.dc:creator: @_J_ava [J]ava
item.description:
@_J_ava wrote:

Well basicly, Iâ€™ve begun hosting a server and my friend wanted to play, he downloaded the client and the windows 7 convert thing and tried to connect, he came up with this error below, the client base is also below. If anyone could help it would be great!

Client base: Exion
His system: Windows 7 (64-bit)

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Jframe
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Jframe
        at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run<Unknown Source>
        at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged<Native Method>
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.findclass<Unknown Source>
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass<Unknown Source>
        at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass<Unknown Source>
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass <Unknown Source>
Could not find the main class: Jframe. Program will exit.

Normal Run (VISTA - XP)

@echo off
title Exion Client
java -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32
pause

Windows 7

@echo off title Client cd ./Class/ "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx200m Jframe 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause

Read full topic
